about_the_game:
This is a 2D action game with Roguelike elements. In the game, you are playing a greasy uncle who has always dreamed of becoming a reporter. he will go into professor yang's clinic alone, collect as much evidence as possible, help as many NPC's as possible, and defeat one enemy after another. What the final outcome will be, you need to experience it yourself.

About Basic Play:
1. In the game, players need to pick up weapons and throw them at the enemy to cause damage.
2. Players can take photos with cameras to obtain more evidence of crimes. The amount of evidence will affect the final result of the game.
3. Players can save NPC in the game. Moreover, players and NPC have gradually established a relationship.

About moral choice
Players can choose whether to try their best to save every NPC in the game, and the choice of players may bring very different changes to the game experience later.

About the game mode
At present, there is only one basic adventure mode in the game, and there are currently five levels of adventure mode. The player needs to start from the first level, finally reach the fifth level and defeat the final BOSS.

About roguelike element in the game
At present, the map of the game uses roguelike to randomly generate the map of the game. In addition, the game provides nearly 100 kinds of props, more than 20 kinds of enemies, will appear in a random way, as far as possible to make every adventure is different. In the following, I will continue to update and add more kinds of props and enemies.

content_descriptors.notes: Npcs in this game are children, and they mey be get hurt by enemies.
